original_text: From thence it passed toward Azmon, and went out unto the river of Egypt; and the goings out of that coast were at the sea: this shall be your south coast.
korean_text: 거기서 아스몬에 이르러 애굽 시내로 나아가 바다에 이르러 경계의 끝이 되나니 이것이 너희 남쪽 경계가 되리라

sentences.original_text: From thence it passed toward Azmon
and went out unto the river of Egypt
and the goings out of that coast were at the sea
this shall be your south coast
